title: Separation
description: From the time she was very young until she became an adult, Star's whole life was always about finding her family and a home to call her own. As far back as she could remember, she had been sent away to live with people she didn't know. She was passed back and forth between family, strangers, and foster care.  Growing up, Star endured many types of abuse and lossâ€”painful experiences that sent her spiralling into all the wrong things. This short-story series of a girl who started out lost but eventually found her way will touch your heart and speak to those who have experienced similar trauma in their own lives.
author: Angelique S. Anderson
